forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 49. North northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the skies are clear, painting a serene canvas that reflects the calm of the overnight chill. The temperature lingers in the comfortable vicinity of 49 degrees, with a brisk north-northeast wind whispering at 15 mph, keeping the air fresh and invigorating. Although it is still early, signs of a sunny day are evident as the city prepares for the warmth of afternoon sun, expected to crest at around 61 degrees.

The absence of fog is a welcome sight, allowing for unobstructed views of the iconic landscapes. By midday, as temperatures begin to dip to around 57 degrees, the gentle caress of the breeze invites residents to embrace a light layer—perhaps a cozy sweater or a soft scarf, perfect for a stroll through the streets or a relaxed afternoon gathering at a café. With such delightful weather calling, consider basking in the calm charm of the city. A quiet walk along the Embarcadero or an explorative jaunt through Golden Gate Park beckons, each path promising simple pleasures amidst the thriving backdrop of urban life.
